value.title: DAX Fridays #201: How to create virtual tables using DAX
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how you create virtual tables in DAX to do calculations on them.   Happy Friday!  The  sample file is available for download here: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: DAX Fridays! #74: PREVIOUSDAY, PREVIOUSMONTH, PREVIOUSQUARTER, PREVIOUSYEAR

value.title: DAX Fridays! #80: DATESBETWEEN

value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example.  In today's video, I will show you how to do that with just a few simple steps!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool

value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
